{"id":808016001,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1664079815,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/808016001/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check Distances Between Same Letters","memory":"43.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean checkDistances(String s, int[] distance) {\n        HashMap<Character,Integer>hm=new HashMap<>();\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)\n        {\n            if(hm.containsKey(s.charAt(i))==false) hm.put(s.charAt(i),i);\n            else hm.put(s.charAt(i),i-hm.get(s.charAt(i))-1);\n        }\n        for(Map.Entry<Character,Integer>e:hm.entrySet())\n            if(distance[(int)e.getKey()-97]!=e.getValue())return false;\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-distances-between-same-letters","has_notes":false}
